title: DeVos Defends Debt, Woke When Provoked 12.9.19
itunes:title: DeVos Defends Debt, Woke When Provoked 12.9.19
description:
In episode 531, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Jamie Loftus to discuss how Trump employed undocumented immigrants, Gayle King's interview with Bloomberg, Pete Buttigieg's time at McKinsey, Trump making sensitive calls on lines open to surveillance, Betsey DeVos scheming to hurt candidates who want to cancel student loans, William Barr coming up empty, UPS coming out to support the police who killed their own employee, Uber's horrible stats, the new Clint Eastwood movie Richard Jewell, that Peloton ad, and more!

FOOTNOES:

  1. How two housekeepers took on the president — and revealed that his company employed undocumented immigrants
  2. Former NYC Mayor @MikeBloomberg tells @GayleKing "nobody asked" him about stop & frisk until he started running for president.
  3. .@MikeBloomberg on candidates' diversity: "Don't complain to me that you're not in the race" 
  4. When Pete Buttigieg Was One of McKinsey’s ‘Whiz Kids’
  5. Trump 'routinely' made sensitive calls on lines open to Russian surveillance, White House officials say
  6. 'Flat-Out Corruption': DeVos Accused of Scheming to Stop Next President From Canceling Student Loan Debt
  7. Barr’s handpicked prosecutor tells inspector general he can’t back right-wing theory that Russia case was U.S. intelligence setup
  8. if I am ever killed at work I hope my employer thanks my killer
  9. 4 Dead After Armed Robbers Hijack UPS Truck
  10. As Uber Prepares to Go Public, This Man Is Racing to Clean It Up
  11. Uber’s first ever safety report discloses 3,045 sexual assaults and nine murders in the US last year
  12. ‘Richard Jewell’: Clint Eastwood Declares War on the ‘Corrupt’ Media and FBI
  13. Did Clint Eastwood Troll Pro-Impeachment Democrats With ‘Quid Pro Quo’ Line in ‘Richard Jewell’?
  14. Clint Eastwood on Donald Trump’s racism: “just fucking get over it”
  15. Peloton share prices plummet as spin bike brand unveils losses of $49.8 million
  16. Peloton loses $1.5bn in value over 'dystopian, sexist' exercise bike ad
  17. Peloton responds to ad criticism, says it’s ‘disappointed in how some have misinterpreted’ the spot
  18. WATCH: YUNG BAE - I Want Cha Back

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
